keyword: how many calories in chick fil a nuggets
title: How Many Calories in Chick-fil-A Nuggets?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in chick fil a nuggets—an 8-piece serving has 250 kcal—plus full nutrition facts, macros, sodium, and preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in Chick-fil-A Nuggets?
assumptions: Fried Chick-fil-A chicken nuggets, 8-piece serving (about 104 g), no dipping sauce or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and exact portion; values based on standard Chick-fil-A data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An 8-piece serving of Chick-fil-A nuggets provides 250 kcal and 27 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an 8-piece Chick-fil-A nuggets?
What is the protein in Chick-fil-A nuggets?
Are Chick-fil-A nuggets high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 8 pieces contain 830 mg sodium—about 36% of daily value.

faqs.q: How do grilled vs. fried Chick-fil-A nuggets compare?
faqs.a: Grilled 8-piece: 130 kcal, 25 g protein, 3 g fat; fried: 250 kcal, higher fat.

faqs.q: Calories in Chick-fil-A nuggets with sauce?
faqs.a: Base 250 kcal + 110–140 kcal per sauce packet, depending on type.
